'''Golden Rose Seeds''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained by breaking flowers in four locations in the [[Hypostyle Desert]]. They are part of the [[Golden Life, From Yesteryear Awoken]] [[Hidden Exploration Objective]].

Note that while there are four Seeds, the quest only consumes three, leaving one behind in the player's inventory as a memento.
